rank.noEntries: No entries found for this page.

bonus.notInServer: This user is not in the server.
bonus.cannotAddXP: You cannot add bonus XP to bots.
bonus.massXP: This server already has a mass role operation running.
bonus.successfully: Successfully gave {{changeAmount}} bonus XP to {{affected}} member(s) with role {{role}}

channel.deprecated:
## No-Command Channels are __deprecated__.

Manage Application Command permissions in **Server Settings > Integrations > ActivityRank** instead!

*You can still **disable** No-Command channels.*'
channel.noCommandDesription:
If this is enabled, commands will not work in this channel.
> **Note:** It is recommended to use the Discord native system in **Server Settings -> Integrations -> ActivityRank** instead
channel.commandOnlyDescription:
If this is enabled, this will be the **only channel commands will work in**, unless you have the **Manage Server** permission.
> **Note:** It is recommended to use the Discord native system in **Server Settings -> Integrations -> ActivityRank** instead.
channel.joinChannelDescription: If this is enabled, server join messages will be sent to this channel.
channel.levelupChannelDescription: If this is enabled, levelup messages will be sent to this channel.
channel.conflict:
You have specified both a channel and an ID, but they do not match.
Did you mean: /config-channel channel:{{value}}
channel.notSpecified: You need to specify either a channel or a channel's ID!
channel.missingPerms: You need the permission to manage the server in order to use this command.
channel.noXPenabled: If this is enabled, no xp will be given in this channel.
